psionic.name: Adaptive Body
entries: You can alter your body to match your surroundings, allowing you to withstand punishing environments. With greater psi energy, you can extend this protection to others.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you don't need to eat, breathe, or sleep. To gain the benefits of a long rest, you can spend 8 hours engaged in light activity, rather than sleeping during any of it.

modes.name: Environmental Adaptation
entries: Com a acció, you or a creature you touch ignores the effects of extreme heat or cold (but not cold or fire damage) for the next hour

modes.name: Adaptive Shield
entries: When you take àcid, elèctric, foc, fred, o tro damage, you can use your reaction to gain resistance to damage of that type—including the triggering damage—fins el final del teu proper torn.

modes.name: Energy Adaptation
entries: Com a acció, you can touch one creature and give it resistance to àcid, elèctric, foc, fred, o tro damage (escull), which lasts until your concentration ends.

modes.name: Energy Immunity
entries: Com a acció, you can touch one creature and give it immunity to àcid, elèctric, foc, fred, o tro damage (escull), which lasts until your concentration ends.

psionic.name: Aura Sight
entries: You refocus your sight to see the energy that surrounds all creatures. You perceive auras, energy signatures that can reveal key elements of a creature's nature.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens avantatge a tirades de Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) checks.

modes.name: Assess Foe
entries: Com a acció bonus, you analyze the aura of one creature you see. You learn its current hit point total and all its immunities, resistances, and vulnerabilities.

modes.name: Read Moods
entries: Com a acció bonus, you learn a one-word summary of the emotional state of up to six creatures you can see, such as happy, confused, afraid, or violent.

modes.name: View Aura
entries: Com a acció, you study one creature's aura. Until your concentration ends, while you can see the target, you learn if it's under the effect of any magical or psionic effects, its current hit point total, and its basic emotional state. While this effect lasts, tens avantatge a tirades de Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) and Carisma checks you make against it.

modes.name: Perceive the Unseen
entries: Com a acció bonus, you gain the ability to see auras even of {@condition invisible} or hidden creatures. Until your concentration ends, you can see all creatures, including hidden and {@condition invisible} ones, regardless of lighting conditions.

psionic.name: Beacon
entries: Com a acció bonus, you cause bright light to radiate from your body in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. The light lasts durant 1 hora, and you can extinguish it earlier as a bonus action.

psionic.name: Bestial Form
entries: You transform your body, gaining traits of different beasts
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens avantatge a tirades de Saviesa ({@skill Tracte amb Animals}) checks.

modes.name: Bestial Claws
entries: You manifest long claws for an instant and make a atac armat cos a cos against one creature within 5 feet of you. Si impacta, this attack deals {@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi} de dany tallant per psi point spent.

modes.name: Bestial Transformation
entries: Com a acció bonus, you alter your physical form to gain different characteristics. When you use this ability, you can choose one or more of the following effects. Each effect has its own psi point cost. Add them together to determine the total cost. This transformation lasts durant 1 hora, until you die, o fins que l'acabis as a bonus action.

submodes.name: Amfibi
entries: You gain gills; pots respirar aire i a l'aigua

submodes.name: Climbing
entries: You grow tiny hooked claws that give you gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed

submodes.name: Vol
entries: Wings sprout from your back. Obtèns una velocitat de vol equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar.

submodes.name: Sentits Aguts
entries: Your eyes and ears become more sensitive. You gain advantage on Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks.

submodes.name: Perfect Senses
entries: You gain a keen sense of smell and an instinct to detect prey. You can see {@condition invisible} creatures and objects within 10 feet of you, even if you are {@condition encegat}.

submodes.name: Swimming
entries: You gain fins and webbing between your fingers and toes; you gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

submodes.name: Tough Hide
entries: Your skin becomes as tough as leather; tens +1 a la CA.

psionic.name: Blade Meld
entries: Com a acció bonus, a one-handed melee weapon you hold becomes one with your hand. For the next minute, you can't let go of the weapon nor can it be forced from your grasp.

psionic.name: Blind Spot
entries: Com a acció, you erase your image from the mind of una criatura que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast; l'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa, or you are {@condition invisible} to it fins el final del teu proper torn.

psionic.name: Brute Force
entries: You augment your natural strength with psionic energy, granting you the ability to achieve incredible feats of might.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens avantatge a tirades de Força ({@skill Atletisme}) checks

modes.name: Brute Strike
entries: Com a acció bonus, you gain a bonus to your next damage roll against a target you hit with a melee attack during the current turn. The bonus equals +{@scaledamage 1d6|1-7|1d6|psi} per psi point spent, and the bonus damage is the same type as the attack. If the attack has more than one damage type, you choose which one to use for the bonus damage.

modes.name: Knock Back
entries: When you hit a target with a melee attack, you can activate this ability as a reaction. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Força or be knocked 10 peus lluny de tu per psi point spent. The target moves in a straight line. If it hits an object, this movement immediately ends and l'objectiu rep {@scaledamage 1d6|1-7|1d6|psi} de dany contundent per psi point spent.

modes.name: Mighty Leap
entries: As part of your movement, you jump in any direction fins a 20 peus per psi point spent.

modes.name: Feat of Força
entries: Com a acció bonus, Tens un +5 a Força checks fins el final del teu proper torn.

psionic.name: Celerity
entries: You channel psionic power into your body, honing your reflexes and agility to an incredible degree. The world seems to slow down while you continue to move as normal.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, your walking speed increases by 10 feet.

modes.name: Rapid Step
entries: Com a acció bonus, you increase your walking speed by 10 feet per psi point spent fins el final del torn actual. If you have a climbing or swimming speed, this increase applies to that speed as well.

modes.name: Agile Defense
entries: Com a acció bonus, you take the Dodge action

modes.name: Blur of Motion
entries: Com a acció, you cause yourself to be {@condition invisible} during any of your movement during the current turn.

modes.name: Surge of Speed
entries: Com a acció bonus, you gain two benefits fins el final del torn actual: you don't provoke opportunity attacks, and obténs una velocitat d'escalada equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar.

modes.name: Surge of Action
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can Dash or make one weapon attack.

psionic.name: Corrosive Metabolism
entries: Your control over your body allows you to deliver acid or poison attacks.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens resistència al dany d'àcid and poison

modes.name: Corrosive Touch
entries: Com a acció, you deliver a touch of acid to one creature within your reach. The target ha de salvar per Destresa, taking {@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi} de dany d'àcid per psi point spent; si supera, en rep la meitat.

modes.name: Venom Strike
entries: Com a acció, you create a esprai de verí that targets una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució. Si falla, rep {@scaledamage 1d6|1-7|1d6|psi} de dany de verí per psi point spent i està {@condition emmetzinat} fins el final del teu proper torn. Si supera, l'objectiu rep la meitat del dany i no està {@condition emmetzinat}.

modes.name: Acid Spray
entries: As a reaction when you take piercing or slashing damage, you cause acid to spray from your wound; each creature within 5 feet of you rep {@damage 2d6} de dany d'àcid.

modes.name: Breath of the Black Dragon
entries: You exhale a wave of acid en una línia de 60 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura a dins de la línia ha de salvar per Constitució. Si falla, rep {@damage 6d6} de dany d'àcid si falla, or half as much on a successful one. You can increase the damage by {@scaledamage 6d6|5-7|1d6|psi} per additional psi point spent on it.

modes.name: Breath of the Green Dragon
entries: You exhale a cloud of poison en un con de 90 peus. Tota criatura a dins de la línia ha de salvar per Constitució. Si falla, rep {@damage 10d6} de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

psionic.name: Crown of Despair
entries: You have learned to harvest seeds of despair in a creature's psyche, wracking it with self-doubt and inaction
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens avantatge a tirades de Carisma ({@skill Intimidació}) checks.

modes.name: Crowned in Sorrow
entries: Com a acció, una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast ha de salvar per Carisma. Si falla, rep {@damage 1d8} de dany psíquic per psi point spent, and it can't take reactions fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. Si supera en rep la meitat.

modes.name: Call to Inaction
entries: If you spend 1 minute conversing with a creature, you can attempt to seed it with overwhelming ennui. At the end of the minute, pots, com a acció, force the creature salvar per Saviesa. The save automatically succeeds if the target is immune to being {@condition fascinat}. Si falla, it sits i està {@condition incapacitat} until your concentration ends. This effect immediately ends if the target or any ally it can see is attacked or takes damage. Si supera, the creature is unaffected and has no inkling of your attempt to bend its will.

modes.name: Visions of Despair
entries: Com a acció, you force una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast salvar per Carisma. Si falla, rep {@damage 3d6} de dany psíquic, and its speed is reduced to 0 fins el final del seu proper torn. Si supera en rep la meitat. You can increase the damage by {@scaledamage 3d6|3-7|1d6|psi} per additional psi point spent on it.

modes.name: Dolorous Mind
entries: Com a acció, you choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. It must succeed on a Carisma saving throw, or it is {@condition incapacitat} and has a speed of 0 until your concentration ends. It can repeat this saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

psionic.name: Crown of Disgust
entries: You cause a creature to be flooded with emotions of disgust.
psionic.focus: While you are focused on this discipline, the area in a 5 foot radius around you is terreny difícil for any enemy that isn't immune to being {@condition acovardit}.

modes.name: Eye of Horror
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Carisma. Si falla, rep {@scaledamage 1d6|1-7|1d6|psi} de dany psíquic per psi point spent and can't move closer to you fins el final del seu proper torn. Si supera en rep la meitat.

modes.name: Wall of Repulsion
entries: Com a acció, you create an invisible, insubstantial wall of energy within 60 feet of you that is fins a 30 peus long, 10 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall lasts until your concentration ends. Any creature attempting to move through ha de salvar per Saviesa. Si falla, a creature can't move through the wall fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. Si supera, the creature can pass through it. A creature must make this save whenever it attempts to pass through the wall, whether willingly or unwillingly.

modes.name: Visions of Disgust
entries: You cause a creature to regard all other beings as horrid, alien entities. Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa. Si falla, rep {@damage 5d6} de dany psíquic, and until your concentration ends, it rep {@damage 1d6} de dany psíquic per creature within 5 feet of it al final de cada torn seu. Si supera, the target takes only half the initial damage and suffers none of the other effects.

modes.name: World of Horror
entries: Com a acció, escull fins a sis criatures within 60 feet of you. Each target ha de salvar per Carisma. Si falla, a target rep {@damage 8d6} de dany psíquic, and està {@condition acovardit} until your concentration ends. Si supera en rep la meitat. While {@condition acovardit} by this effect, a target's speed is reduced to 0, and the target can use its action, and any bonus action it might have, only to make melee attacks. L'objectiu {@condition acovardit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

psionic.name: Crown of Rage
entries: You place a mote of pure fury within a creature's mind, causing its bloodlust to overcome its senses and for it to act as you wish it to.
psionic.focus: While you are focused on this discipline, any enemy within 5 feet of you that makes a melee attack roll against creatures other than you does so with disadvantage

modes.name: Primal Fury
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Carisma. Si falla, rep {@scaledamage 1d6|1-7|1d6|psi} de dany psíquic per psi point spent on this ability and immediately use its reaction to move its speed in a straight line toward its nearest enemy. The save automatically succeeds if the target is immune to being {@condition fascinat}.

modes.name: Fighting Words
entries: If you spend 1 minute conversing with a creature, you can attempt to leave a simmering violence in its mind. At the end of the minute, pots, com a acció, force the creature salvar per Saviesa to resist feeling violent urges against one creature you describe to it or name. The save automatically succeeds if the target is immune to being {@condition fascinat}. Si falla, the target attacks the chosen creature if it sees that creature before your concentration ends, using weapons or spells against a creature it was already hostile toward or atacs desarmats against an ally or a creature it was neutral toward. Once the fight starts, it continues to attack for 5 rounds before this effect ends. This effect immediately ends if the target or any ally it can see is attacked or takes damage from any creature other than the one it has been incited against. Si supera, the creature is unaffected and has no inkling of your attempt to bend its will.

modes.name: Mindless Courage
entries: You cause a creature's bloodlust to overcome its sense of preservation. Com a acció bonus, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa or, fins el final del teu proper torn, it can't willingly move unless its movement brings it closer to its nearest enemy that it can see. The save automatically succeeds if the target is immune to being {@condition fascinat}.

modes.name: Punishing Fury
entries: You cause a creature's rage to grow so hot that it attacks without heeding its own safety. Com a acció bonus, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa or, until your concentration ends, any creature within 5 feet of it can use a reaction to make a melee attack against it whenever the target makes a melee attack. The save automatically succeeds if the target is immune to being {@condition fascinat}.

psionic.name: Delusion
entries: Com a acció, you plant a false belief in the mind of una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. You can create a sound or an image. Only the target of this talent perceives the sound or image you create.

If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a creature's roar, a musical instrument, or any other sound you pick. It lasts durant 1 minut.

If you create an object, it must fit within a 5-foot cube and can't move or be reflective. The image can't create any effect that influences a sense other than sight. The image lasts for 1 minute, and it disappears if the creature touches it.

psionic.name: Diminution
entries: You manipulate the matter that composes your body, drastically reducing your size without surrendering any of your might.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens avantatge a tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}).

modes.name: Miniature Form
entries: Com a acció bonus, you become Tiny until your concentration ends. While this size, Tens un +5 a Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks and can move through gaps up to 6 inches across without squeezing.

modes.name: Toppling Shift
entries: Com a acció bonus, you shift to an incredibly small size and then suddenly return to normal, sending an opponent flying backward. Escull una criatura que puguis veure a 5 peus d'abast. Ha de salvar per Força. Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}.

modes.name: Sudden Shift
entries: As a reaction when you are hit by an attack, you shift down to minute size to avoid the attack. The attack misses, and you move fins a 5 peus sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat before returning to normal size.

modes.name: Microscopic Form
entries: Com a acció bonus, you become smaller than Tiny until your concentration ends. While this size, Tens un +10 a Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks and a +5 bonus to AC, you can move through gaps up to 1 inch across without squeezing, and you can't make weapon attacks.

psionic.name: Energy Beam
entries: Com a acció, you target una criatura que puguis veure a 90 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Destresa. Si falla, rep {@damage 1d8} àcid, elèctric, foc, fred, o tro damage (escull).
The talent's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).

psionic.name: Giant Growth
entries: You infuse yourself with psionic energy to grow to tremendous size, bolstering your strength and durability.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, your reach increases by 5 feet.

modes.name: Ogre Form
entries: Com a acció bonus, you gain 10 punts de vida temporals. A més, until your concentration ends, your atacs armats cos a cos deal an extra {@damage 1d4} de dany contundent on a hit, and your reach increases by 5 feet. If you're smaller than Large, you also become Large for the duration.

modes.name: Giant Form
entries: Com a acció bonus, you gain 30 punts de vida temporals. A més, until your concentration ends, your atacs armats cos a cos deal an extra {@damage 2d6} de dany contundent on a hit, and your reach increases by 10 feet. If you're smaller than Huge, you also become Huge for the duration.

psionic.name: Fortalesa Intel·lectual
entries: You forge an indomitable wall of psionic energy around your mind—one that allows you to launch counterattacks against your opponents.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you gain resistance to psychic damage.

modes.name: Psychic Backlash
entries: Com a reacció, you can impose disadvantage on an attack roll against you if you can see the attacker. If the attack still hits you, the attacker rep {@damage 2d10} de dany psíquic.

modes.name: Psychic Parry
entries: As a reaction when you make an salvada per Intel·ligència, Saviesa, o Carisma, Tens un +1 a that saving throw for each psi point you spend on this ability. You can use this ability after rolling the die but before suffering the results.

modes.name: Psychic Redoubt
entries: Com a acció, you create a field of protective psychic energy. Choose any number of creatures within 30 feet of you. Until your concentration ends, each target has resistance to psychic damage and advantage on Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma saving throws.

psionic.name: Iron Durability
entries: You transform your body to become a living metal, allowing you to shrug off attacks that would cripple weaker creatures.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens +1 a la CA.

modes.name: Iron Hide
entries: As a reaction when you are hit by an attack, tens +1 a la CA for each psi point you spend on this ability. The bonus lasts fins el final del teu proper torn. This bonus applies against the triggering attack.

modes.name: Steel Hide
entries: Com a acció bonus, you gain resistance to dany contundent, tallant, i perforant fins el final del teu proper torn.

modes.name: Iron Resistència
entries: Com a acció, you gain resistance to dany contundent, perforant o tallant (escull), which lasts until your concentration ends.

psionic.name: Pas Lleuger
entries: Com a acció bonus, you alter your density and weight to improve your mobility. For the rest of your turn, your walking speed increases by 10 feet, and the first time you stand up this turn, you do so without expending any of your movement if your speed is greater than 0.

psionic.name: Mantle of Awe
entries: You learn to use psionic energy to manipulate others with a subtle combination of psi and your own, natural charm
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you gain a bonus to Carisma checks. The bonus equals half your Intel·ligència modifier (minimum of +1).

modes.name: Charming Presence
entries: Com a acció, you exert an aura of sympathetic power. Roll {@dice 2d8} per psi point spent on this ability; the total is how many hit points worth of creatures this option can affect. Creatures within 30 feet of you are affected in ascending order of their punts de vida màximss, ignoring {@condition incapacitat} creatures, creatures immune to being {@condition fascinat}, and creatures engaged in combat.

Starting with the creature that has the lowest punts de vida màxims, each creature affected by this option is {@condition fascinat} by you durant 10 minuts, regarding you as a friendly acquaintance. Subtract each creature's punts de vida màxims from the total before moving on to the next creature. A creature's punts de vida màxims must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected

modes.name: Center of Attention
entries: Com a acció, you exert an aura of power that grabs a creature's attention. Escull una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Ha de salvar per Carisma. Si falla, the creature is so thoroughly distracted by you that all other creatures are {@condition invisible} to it until your concentration ends. This effect ends if the creature can no longer see or hear you or if it takes damage.

modes.name: Invoke Awe
entries: Com a acció, you exert an aura that inspires awe in others. Choose up to 5 creatures que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Each target must succeed on an Intel·ligència saving throw or be {@condition fascinat} by you until your concentration ends. While {@condition fascinat}, the target obeys all your verbal commands tan bé com pugui and without doing anything obviously self-destructive. The {@condition fascinat} target will attack only creatures that it has seen attack you since it was {@condition fascinat} or that it was already hostile toward. Al final de cada torn seu, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

psionic.name: Mantle of Command
entries: You exert an aura of trust and authority, enhancing the coordination among your allies.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, when you end your turn and didn't move during it, you can use your reaction to allow one ally que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast to move up to half their speed, following a path of your choice. To move in this way, the ally mustn't be {@condition incapacitat}.

modes.name: Coordinated Movement
entries: Com a acció bonus, choose up to five allies que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Each of those allies can use their reaction to move up to half their speed, following a path of your choice.

modes.name: Commander's Sight
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Fins el final del teu proper torn, your allies have advantage on attack rolls against that target

modes.name: Command to Strike
entries: Com a acció, choose one ally que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. That ally can use their reaction to immediately take the Attack action. You choose the targets.

modes.name: Strategic Mind
entries: Com a acció, you exert an aura of trust and command that unites your allies into a cohesive unit. Until your concentration ends, any ally within 60 feet of you on their turn can, com a acció bonus, take the Dash or Disengage action or roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to each attack roll they make that turn.

modes.name: Overwhelming Attack
entries: Com a acció, choose up to five allies que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Each of those allies can use their reaction to take the Attack action. You choose the target of the attacks.

psionic.name: Mantle of Courage
entries: You focus your mind on courage, radiating confidence and bravado to your allies.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you and allies within 10 feet of you who can see tens avantatge a tirades de saving throws against being {@condition acovardit}.

modes.name: Incite Courage
entries: Com a acció bonus, escull fins a sis criatures que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. If any of those creatures is {@condition acovardit}, that condition ends on that creature.

modes.name: Aura of Victory
entries: Com a acció bonus, you project psionic energy until your concentration ends. The energy fortifies you and your allies when your enemies are felled; whenever an enemy you can see es queda a 0 punts de vida, you and each of your allies within 30 feet of you gain punts de vida temporals equal to double the psi points spent to activate this effect

modes.name: Pillar of Confidence
entries: Com a acció, you and up to five creatures que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast each gain one extra action to use on your individual turns. The action goes away if not used before the end of your next turn. the action can be used only to make one weapon attack or to take the Dash or Disengage action.

psionic.name: Mantle of Temor
entries: You tap into a well of primal fear and turn yourself into a beacon of terror to your enemies.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens avantatge a tirades de Carisma ({@skill Intimidació}) checks.

modes.name: Incite Temor
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa or become {@condition acovardit} de tu until your concentration ends. Whenever the {@condition acovardit} target ends its turn in a location where it can't see you, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

modes.name: Unsettling Aura
entries: Com a acció bonus, you cloak yourself in unsettling psychic energy. Until your concentration ends, any enemy within 60 feet of you that can see you must spend 1 extra foot of movement for every foot it moves toward you. A creature ignores this effect if immune to being {@condition acovardit}.

modes.name: Incite Panic
entries: Com a acció, choose up to eight creatures que puguis veure a 90 peus d'abast that can see you. A l'inici de cada torn de a target before your concentration ends, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa. Si falla, the target is {@condition acovardit} fins a l'inici del seu següent torn, and you roll a die. If you roll an odd number, the {@condition acovardit} target moves half its speed in random direction and takes no action on that turn, other than to scream in terror. If you roll an even number, the {@condition acovardit} target makes one melee attack against a random target within its reach. If there is no such target, it moves half its speed in a random direction and takes no action on that turn. This effect end on a target if it succeeds on three saving throws against it.

psionic.name: Mantle of Fury
entries: You allow the primal fury lurking deep within your mind to burst forth, catching you and you allies in an implacable bloodthirst
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline in combat, you and any ally who starts their turn within 10 feet of you gains a 5 foot increase to their walking speed during that turn.

modes.name: Incite Fury
entries: Com a acció bonus, choose up to three allies que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast (you can choose yourself in place of one of the allies). Until your concentration ends, each target can roll a {@dice d4} when rolling damage for a atac armat cos a cos and add the number rolled to the damage roll.

modes.name: Mindless Charge
entries: Com a acció bonus, escull fins a tres criatures que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Each target can immediately use its reaction to move up to its speed in a straight line toward its nearest enemy

modes.name: Aura of Bloodletting
entries: Com a acció bonus, you unleash an aura of rage. Until your concentration ends, you and any creature within 60 feet of you has advantage on melee attack rolls

modes.name: Overwhelming Fury
entries: Com a acció, you flood rage into una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Carisma, or it can use its actions only to make melee attacks until your concentration ends. Pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

psionic.name: Mantle of Joy
entries: You tap into the joy within you, radiating it outward in soothing, psychic energy that brings hope and comfort to creatures around you.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens avantatge a tirades de Carisma ({@skill Persuasion}) checks

modes.name: Soothing Presence
entries: Com a acció bonus, escull fins a tres criatures que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Each target gains 3 punts de vida temporals per psi point spent on this effect

modes.name: Comforting Aura
entries: Com a acció bonus, choose up to three allies you can see (you can choose yourself in place of one of the allies). Until your concentration ends, each target can roll a {@dice d4} when making a saving throw and add the number rolled to the total.

modes.name: Aura of Jubilation
entries: Com a acció bonus, you radiate a distracting mirth until your concentration ends. Each creature within 60 feet of you that can see you suffers disadvantage on any checks using the {@skill Perception} and {@skill Investigation}.

modes.name: Beacon of Recovery
entries: Com a acció bonus, you and up to five allies que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast can immediately make saving throws against every effect they're suffering that allows a save at the start or end of their turns.

psionic.name: Mastery of Air
entries: You become one with the power of elemental air.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you take no falling damage, and you ignore terreny difícil when walking.

modes.name: Wind Step
entries: As part of your move en el teu torn, you can fly fins a 20 peus for each psi point spent. If you end this flight in the air, you fall unless something else holds you aloft.

modes.name: Wind Stream
entries: Com a acció, you create a line of focused air that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Força, taking {@scaledamage 1d8|1-7|1d8|psi} de dany contundent per psi point spent and being knocked {@condition enderrocat}; si supera, en rep la meitat.

modes.name: Cloak of Air
entries: Com a acció bonus, you seize control of the air around you to create a protective veil. Until your concentration ends, attack rolls against you have disadvantage, and when a creature you can see misses you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to force the creature to repeat the attack roll against itself.

modes.name: Wind Form
entries: Com a acció bonus, obtens una velocitat de vol de 60 peus, which lasts until your concentration ends.

modes.name: Misty Form
entries: Com a acció, your body becomes like a misty cloud until your concentration ends. In this form, you gain resistance to dany contundent, tallant, i perforant, and you can't take actions other than the Dash action. You can pass through openings that are no more than 1 inch wide without squeezing.

modes.name: Animate Air
entries: Com a acció, you cause an air elemental to appear en un espai desocupat que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. The elemental lasts until your concentration ends, and it obeys your verbal commands. In combat, roll for its initiative, and choose its behavior during its turns. When this effect ends, the elemental disappears. See the Monster Manual for its stat block.

psionic.name: Mastery of Fire
entries: You align your mind with the energy of elemental fire.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you gain resistance to fire damage, and Tens un +2 a rolls for fire damage.

modes.name: Combustion
entries: Com a acció, choose one creature or object que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. The target must make a Constitució save. Si falla, rep {@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi} de dany de foc per psi point spent, and it catches on fire. Si falla, rep {@damage 1d6} de dany de foc al final de cada torn seu until your concentration ends or until it or a creature adjacent to it extinguishes the flames with an action. Si supera, l'objectiu rep la meitat del dany and doesn't catch on fire.

modes.name: Rolling Flame
entries: Com a acció, you create fire in a 20-foot-by-20-foot cube within 5 feet of you. The fire lasts until your concentration ends. Any creature in that area when you use this ability and any creature that ends its turn there takes 5 fire damage.

modes.name: Detonation
entries: Com a acció, you create a fiery explosion at a point que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. Tota criatura en una esfera de 20 peus de radi centrada en aquell punt ha de salvar per Constitució. Si falla, rep {@damage 7d6} de dany de foc and being knocked {@condition enderrocat}; si supera, en rep la meitat.

modes.name: Fire Form
entries: Com a acció bonus, you become wreathed in flames until your concentration ends. Any creature that end its turn within 5 feet of you rep {@damage 3d6} de dany de foc.

modes.name: Animate Fire
entries: Com a acció, you cause a fire elemental to appear en un espai desocupat que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. The elemental lasts until your concentration ends, and it obeys your verbal commands. In combat, roll for its initiative, and choose its behavior during its turns. When this effect ends, the elemental disappears. See the Monster Manual for its stat block.

psionic.name: Mastery of Force
entries: As a student of psionic power, you perceive the potential energy that flows through all things. You reach out with your mind, transforming the potential into the actual. Objects and creatures move at your command.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens avantatge a tirades de Força checks.

modes.name: Push
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Força. Si falla, rep {@scaledamage 1d8|1-7|1d8|psi} de dany de força per psi point spent and is pushed fins a 5 peus per point spent in a straight line away from you. Si supera en rep la meitat.

modes.name: Moure
entries: Choose one object que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast that isn't being worn or carried by another creature and that isn't secured in place. It can't be larger than 20 feet on a side, and its maximum weight depends on the psi points spent on this ability, as shown below.

Com a acció, you move the object fins a 60 peus, and you must keep the object within sight during this movement. If the object ends this movement in the air, it falls. If the object would fall on a creature, the creature ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 10). Si falla, take damage as listed on the table below.

modes.name: Inertial Armor
entries: Com a acció, you sheathe yourself in an intangible field of magical force. For 8 hours, your base AC is 14 + el teu modificador de Destresa, and you gain resistance to force damage. This effect ends if you are wearing or don armor.

modes.name: Telekinetic Barrier
entries: Com a acció, you create a transparent wall of telekinetic energy, at least one portion of which must be within 60 feet of you. The wall is 40 feet long, 10 feet high, and 1 inch thick. The wall lasts until your concentration ends. Each 10-foot section of the wall has an AC of 10 and 10 hit points.

modes.name: Grasp
entries: You attempt to grasp a creature in telekinetic energy and hold it captive. Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Força or be {@condition grappled} by you until your concentration ends or until the target leaves your reach, which is 60 feet for this grapple.

The {@condition grappled} target can escape by succeeding on a Força (Atletisme) or Destresa (Acrobàcies) check contested by your psionic ability plus el teu bonus de competència. When a target attempts to escape in this way, you can spend psi points to boost your check, abiding by your psi limit. You gain a +1 bonus per psi point spent.
While a target is {@condition grappled} in this manner, you create one of the following effects as an action:

modes.name: Crush
entries: The target takes {@scaledamage 1d6|1-7|1d6|psi} de dany contundent per psi point spent.

modes.name: Moure
entries: You move the target fins a 5 peus per psi point spent. You can move it in the air and hold it there. It falls if the grapple ends.

psionic.name: Mastery of Ice
entries: You master the power of ice, shaping it to meet you demands.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens resistència al dany de fred.

modes.name: Ice Spike
entries: Com a acció, you hurl a mote of ice at una criatura que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Destresa. Si falla, rep {@scaledamage 1d8|1-7|1d8|psi} de dany de fred per psi point spent and has its speed halved fins el final del teu proper torn. Si supera, l'objectiu rep la meitat del dany.

modes.name: Ice Sheet
entries: Com a acció, choose a point on the ground que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. The ground in a 20-foot radius centered on that point becomes covered in ice durant 10 minuts. It is terreny difícil, and any creature that moves more than 10 feet on ha de salvar per Destresa. Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. If the surface is sloped, a creature that falls {@condition enderrocat} in the area immediately slides to the bottom of the slope.

modes.name: Frozen Sanctuary
entries: Com a acció bonus, you sheathe yourself with icy resilience. You gain 20 punts de vida temporals.

modes.name: Frozen Rain
entries: Com a acció, choose a point que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. The air in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point becomes deathly cold and saturated with moisture. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució. Si falla, a target rep {@damage 6d6} de dany de fred, and its speed is reduced to 0 until your concentration ends. Si supera en rep la meitat.
Com a acció, a target that has its speed reduced can end the effect early if it succeeds on a Força (Atletisme) check with a DC equal to this effect's save DC.
You can increase this effect's damage by {@scaledamage 6d6|5-7|1d6|psi} per each additional psi point spent on it.

modes.name: Ice Barrier
entries: Com a acció, you create a paret de glaç, at least one portion of which must be within 60 feet of you. The wall is 60 feet long, 15 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall lasts until your concentration ends. Each 10-foot section of the wall has AC 12 and 30 hit points. A creature that damages the wall with a melee attack takes cold damage equal to the damage the creature dealt to the wall.

psionic.name: Mastery of Light and Darkness
entries: You claim dominion over light and darkness with your mind.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, natural and magical darkness within 30 feet of you has no effect on your vision.

modes.name: Foscor
entries: Com a acció, you create an area of magical darkness, which foils darkvision. Choose a spot que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Magical darkness radiates from that point in a sphere with a 10-foot radius per psi point spent on this ability. The light produced by spells of 2nd level or less is suppressed in this area.

modes.name: Light
entries: Com a acció, an object you touch radiates light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light lasts until your concentration ends. Alternatively, a creature you touch radiates light in the same manner if it fails a Destresa saving throw. While lit in this manner, it can't hide, and attack rolls against it gain advantage.

modes.name: Shadow Beasts
entries: Com a acció, you cause two {@creature shadow||shadows} to appear in unoccupied spaces que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. The {@creature shadow||shadows} last until your concentration ends, and they obey your verbal commands. In combat, roll for their initiative, and choose their behavior during their turns. When this effect ends, the {@creature shadow||shadows} disappear. See the Monster Manual for their stat block.

modes.name: Radiant Beam
entries: Com a acció, you project a beam of light at una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Destresa. Si falla, rep {@damage 6d6} de dany radiant i està {@condition encegat} until your concentration ends. Si supera en rep la meitat. Un objectiu {@condition encegat} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.
You can increase this effect's damage by {@scaledamage 6d6|5-7|1d6|psi} per each additional psi point spent on it.

psionic.name: Mastery of Water
entries: Your mind becomes one with elemental water, attuning your thoughts to its ebb and flow.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed, and you pot respirar sota l'aigua.

modes.name: Desiccate
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. The target ha de salvar per Constitució, taking {@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi} de dany necròtic per psi point spent on this ability; si supera, en rep la meitat.

modes.name: Watery Grasp
entries: Com a acció, you unleash a wave that surges forth and then retreats to you like the rising tide. You create a wave in a 20-foot-by-20-foot square. At least some portion of the square's border must be within 5 feet of you. Any creature in that square ha de salvar per Força. Si falla, a target rep {@damage 2d6} de dany contundent, is knocked {@condition enderrocat}, and is pulled fins a 10 peus closer to you. Si supera en rep la meitat. You can increase this ability's damage by {@scaledamage 2d6|2-7|1d6|psi} per additional psi point spent on it.

modes.name: Fuet d'Aigua
entries: Com a acció, you unleash a jet of water in a line that is 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Tota criatura a dins de la línia ha de salvar per Força. Si falla, rep {@damage 3d6} de dany contundent; si supera, en rep la meitat. A més, you can move each target that fails its saving throw to any unoccupied space touching the line. You can increase this ability's damage by {@scaledamage 3d6|3-7|1d6|psi} per additional psi point spent on it.

modes.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: Com a acció, you grant yourself and up to ten willing creatures que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast the ability to breathe underwater durant les properes 24 hores.

modes.name: Water Sphere
entries: Com a acció, you cause a sphere of water to form around a creature. Escull una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Destresa. Si falla, it becomes trapped in the sphere of water until your concentration ends. While the target is trapped, its speed is halved, it suffers disadvantage on attack rolls, and it can't see anything more than 10 feet away from it. However, attack rolls against it also suffer disadvantage. L'objectiu pot tornar a salvar al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a successful one.

modes.name: Animate Water
entries: Com a acció, you cause a water elemental to appear en un espai desocupat que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. The elemental lasts until your concentration ends, and it obeys your verbal commands. In combat, roll for its initiative, and choose its behavior during its turns. When this effect ends, the elemental disappears. See the Monster Manual for its stat block.

psionic.name: Mastery of Weather
entries: Your mind reaches into the sky, reshaping the stuff of storms to serve your needs.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens resistència al dany elèctric and thunder.

modes.name: Cloud Steps
entries: Com a acció, you conjure forth clouds to create a solid, translucent staircase that lasts until your concentration ends. The stairs form a spiral that fills a 10-foot-by-10-foot area and reaches upward 20 feet per psi point spent.

modes.name: Hungry Lightning
entries: Com a acció, you lash out at una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast with tendrils of lightning. The target ha de salvar per Destresa, with disadvantage if it's wearing heavy armor. The target takes {@scaledamage 1d8|1-7|1d8|psi} de dany elèctric per psi point spent; si supera, en rep la meitat.

modes.name: Wall of Clouds
entries: Com a acció, you create a wall of clouds, at least one portion of which must be within 60 feet of you. The wall is 60 feet long, 15 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall lasts until your concentration ends. Creatures can pass through it without hindrance, but the wall blocks vision.

modes.name: Galerna
entries: Com a acció, choose a point que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Winds howl in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each creature in the sphere ha de salvar per Força. Si falla, rep {@damage 1d6} de dany contundent and be moved to an unoccupied space of your choice in the sphere. Any loose object in the sphere is moved to an unoccupied space of your choice within it if the object weighs no more than 100 pounds.

modes.name: Lightning Leap
entries: Com a acció, you let loose a line of lightning that is 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Tota criatura a dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa. Si falla, rep {@damage 6d6} de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat. You can then teleport to an unoccupied space touched by the line.
You can increase this ability's damage by {@scaledamage 6d6|5-7|1d6|psi} per additional psi point spent on it.

modes.name: Wall of Thunder
entries: Com a acció, you create a wall of thunder, at least one portion of which must be within 60 feet of you. The wall is 60 feet long, 15 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall lasts until your concentration ends. Every foot moved through the wall costs 1 extra foot of movement. When a creature moves into the wall's space per primer cop en un torn o hi començi el torn, that creature must succeed on a Força saving throw, or it rep {@damage 6d6} de dany de tro, is pushed in a straight line fins a 30 peus away from the wall, i està {@condition enderrocat}.

modes.name: Thunder Clap
entries: Com a acció, choose a point que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Thunder energy erupts in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make Constitució saving throw. Si falla, a target rep {@damage 8d6} de dany de tro, and it is {@condition atordit} fins el final del teu proper torn. Si supera en rep la meitat.

psionic.name: Mastery of Wood and Earth
entries: You attune your mind to seize control of wood and earth.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have a +1 bonus to AC.

modes.name: Animate Weapon
entries: Com a acció, your mind seizes control of a one-handed melee weapon you're holding. The weapon flies toward una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast and makes a one-handed atac armat cos a cos against it, using your discipline attack modifier for the attack and damage rolls. Si impacta, the weapon deals its normal damage, plus an extra {@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi} de dany de força per psi point spent on this ability. The weapon returns to your grasp after it attacks.

modes.name: Warp Weapon
entries: Com a acció, choose one nonmagical weapon held by una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. That creature must succeed on a Força saving throw, or the chosen weapon can't be used to attack fins el final del teu proper torn.

modes.name: Warp Armor
entries: Com a acció, choose a nonmagical suit of armor worn by una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. That creature must succeed on a Constitució saving throw, or the creature's AC becomes 10 + its Destresa modifier fins el final del teu proper torn.

modes.name: Wall of Wood
entries: Com a acció, you create a wall of wood at least one portion of which must be within 60 feet of you. The wall is 60 feet long, 15 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall lasts until your concentration ends. Each 5-foot wide section of the wall has AC 12 and 100 hit points. Breaking one section creates a 5-foot by 5-foot hole in it, but the wall otherwise remains intact.

modes.name: Armored Form
entries: Com a acció bonus, you gain resistance to dany contundent, tallant, i perforant, which lasts until your concentration ends.

modes.name: Animate Earth
entries: Com a acció, you cause an earth elemental to appear en un espai desocupat que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. The elemental lasts until your concentration ends, and it obeys your verbal commands. In combat, roll for its initiative, and choose its behavior during its turns. When this effect ends, the elemental disappears. See the Monster Manual for its stat block.

psionic.name: Mind Meld
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can communicate telepathically with una criatura voluntària que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. The target must have an Intel·ligència of at least 2, otherwise this talent fails and the action is wasted.

This communication can occur fins el final del torn actual. You don't need to share a language with the target for it to understand your telepathic utterances, and it understands you even if it lacks a language. You also gain access to one memory of the target's choice, gaining perfect recall of one thing it saw or did.

psionic.name: Mind Slam
entries: Com a acció, you target una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució. Si falla, rep {@damage 1d6} de dany de força. If it takes any of this damage and is Large or smaller, it is knocked {@condition enderrocat}.
The talent's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).

psionic.name: Desestabilització Cerebral
entries: Com a acció, you target una criatura que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, rep {@damage 1d10} de dany psíquic.
The talent's damage increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d10}), 11th level ({@damage 3d10}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d10}).

psionic.name: Mystic Charm
entries: Com a acció, you beguile one humanoid que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Carisma or be {@condition fascinat} by you fins el final del teu proper torn.

psionic.name: Mystic Hand
entries: Pots, com a acció, manipulate or move one object within 30 feet of you. The object can't weigh more than 10 pounds, and you can't affect an object being worn or carried by another creature. If the object is loose, you can move it fins a 30 peus in any direction.
This talent allows you to open an unlocked door, pour out a beer stein, and so on.
The object falls to the ground at the end of your turn if you leave it suspended in midair.

psionic.name: Nomadic Arrow
entries: You imbue a ranged weapon with a strange semblance of sentience, allowing it to unerringly find its mark.
psionic.focus: While you are focused on this discipline, any attack roll you make for a atac armat a distància ignores disadvantage. If disadvantage would normally apply to the roll, that roll also can't benefit from advantage.

modes.name: Speed Dard
entries: Com a acció bonus, you imbue one ranged weapon you hold with psionic power. The next attack you make with it that hits before the end of the current turn deals an extra {@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi} de dany psíquic per psi point spent.

modes.name: Seeking Missile
entries: As a reaction when you miss with a atac armat a distància, you can repeat the attack roll against the same target.

modes.name: Faithful Archer
entries: Com a acció bonus, you imbue a ranged weapon with a limited sentience. Until your concentration ends, you can make an extra attack with the weapon a l'inici de cada torn teu (no requereix acció). If it is a thrown weapon, it returns to your grasp each time you make any attack with it.

psionic.name: Nomadic Chameleon
entries: You create a screen of psychic power that distorts your appearance, allowing you to blend into the background or even turn invisible.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens avantatge a tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}).

modes.name: Chameleon
entries: Com a acció, you can attempt to hide even if you fail to meet the requirements needed to do so. At the end of the current turn, you remain hidden only if you then meet the normal requirements for hiding.

modes.name: Step from Sight
entries: Com a acció bonus, cloak yourself from sight. pots designar una criatura adicional for every additional psi point you spend on this ability. The added targets must be visible to you and within 60 feet of you. Each target turns {@condition invisible} and remains so until your concentration ends or until immediately after it targets, damages, or otherwise affects any creature with an attack, a spell, or another ability.

modes.name: Enduring Invisibility
entries: Com a acció bonus, you turn {@condition invisible} and remain so until your concentration ends.

psionic.name: Nomadic Mind
entries: You dispatch part of your psyche into the noosphere, the collective vista of minds and knowledge possessed by living things.
psionic.focus: Whenever you focus on this discipline, you choose one skill or tool and have proficiency with it until your focus ends. Alternatively, you gain the ability to read and write one language of your choice until your focus ends.

modes.name: Wandering Mind
entries: You enter a deep contemplation. If you concentrate for this option's full duration, you then gain proficiency with up to three of the following skills (one skill for every 2 psi points spent): {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Performance}, {@skill Religion}, i {@skill Survival}. The benefit lasts durant 1 hora, no concentration required.

modes.name: Find Creature
entries: You cast your mind about for information about a specific creature. If you concentrate for this option's full duration, you then gain a general understanding of the creature's current location. You learn the region, city, town, village, or district where it is, pinpointing an area between 1 and 3 miles on a side (DM's choice). If the creature is on another plane of existence, you instead learn which plane.

modes.name: Item Lore
entries: You carefully study an item. If you concentrate for this option's full duration while remaining within 5 feet of the item, you then gain the benefits of an identify spell cast on that item.

modes.name: Psychic Speech
entries: Com a acció, you attune your mind to the psychic imprint of all language. Durant 1 hora, you gain the ability to understand any language you hear or attempt to read. A més, when you speak, all creatures that can understand a language understand what you say, regardless of what language you use.

modes.name: Wandering Eye
entries: Com a acció, you create a psychic sensor within 60 feet of you. The sensor lasts until your concentration ends. The sensor is invisible and hovers in the air. You mentally receive visual information from it, which has normal vision and darkvision amb un abast de 60 peus. The sensor can look in all directions. Com a acció, you can move the sensor fins a 30 peus in any direction. There is no limit to how far away from you the eye can move, but it can't enter another plane of existence. A solid barrier blocks the eye's movement, but the eye can pass through an opening as small as 1 inch in diameter

modes.name: Phasing Eye
entries: As Wandering Eye above, except the eye can move through solid objects but can't end its movement in one. If it does so, the effect immediately ends.

psionic.name: Nomadic Step
entries: You exert your mind on the area around you, twisting the intraplanar pathways you perceive to allow instantaneous travel.
psionic.focus: After you teleport en el teu torn while focused on this discipline, your walking speed increases by 10 feet fins el final del torn, as you are propelled by the magic of your teleportation. You can receive this increase only un cop per torn.

modes.name: Step of a Dozen Paces
entries: If you haven't moved yet en el teu torn, you take a bonus action to teleport fins a 20 peus per psi point spent a un espai desocupat que puguis veure, and your speed is reduced to 0 fins el final del torn.

modes.name: Nomadic Anchor
entries: Com a acció, you create an invisible, intangible teleportation anchor in a 5-foot cube que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. Durant les properes 8 hores, whenever you use this psionic discipline to teleport, you can instead teleport to the anchor, even if you can't see it, but it must be within range of the teleportation ability.

modes.name: Defensive Step
entries: When you are hit by an attack, you can use your reaction to gain a +4 bonus to AC against that attack, possibly turning it into a miss. You then teleport fins a 10 peus a un espai desocupat que puguis veure.

modes.name: There and Back Again
entries: Com a acció bonus, you teleport fins a 20 peus a un espai desocupat que puguis veure and then move up to half your speed. At the end of your turn, you can teleport back to the spot you occupied before teleporting, unless it is now occupied or on a different plane of existence.

modes.name: Transposition
entries: If you haven't moved yet en el teu torn, choose an ally que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Com a acció bonus, you and that creature teleport, swapping places, and your speed is reduced to 0 fins el final del torn. This ability fails and is wasted if either of you can't fit in the destination space.

modes.name: Baleful Transposition
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. That creature ha de salvar per Saviesa. Si falla, you and that creature teleport, swapping places. This ability fails and is wasted if either of you can't fit in the destination space.

modes.name: Phantom Caravan
entries: Com a acció, you and up to six willing creatures of your choice que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast teleport up to 1 mile to a spot you can see. If there isn't an open space for all the targets to occupy at the arrival point, this ability fails and is wasted.

modes.name: Nomad's Gate
entries: Com a acció, you create a 5-foot cube of dim, gray light within 5 feet of you. You create an identical cube at any point of your choice within 1 mile that you have viewed within the past 24 hours. Until your concentration ends, anyone entering one of the cubes immediately teleports to the other one, appearing in an unoccupied space next to it. The teleportation fails if there is no space for the creature to appear in.

psionic.name: Precognition
entries: By analyzing information around you, from subtle hints to seemingly disconnected facts, you learn to weave a string of probabilities in an instant that gives you extraordinary insights.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens avantatge a tirades de initiative rolls.

modes.name: Precognitive Hunch
entries: Com a acció bonus, you open yourself to receive momentary insights that improve your odds of success; until your concentration ends, whenever you make an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, you roll a {@dice d4} and add it to the total.

modes.name: All-Around Sight
entries: In response to an attack hitting you, you use your reaction to impose disadvantage on that attack roll, possibly causing it to miss.

modes.name: Danger Sense
entries: Com a acció, you create a psychic model of reality in your mind and set it to show you a few seconds into the future. Until your concentration ends, you can't be surprised, attack rolls against you can't gain advantage, and Tens un +10 a initiative.

modes.name: Victory Before Battle
entries: When you roll initiative, you can use this ability to grant yourself and up to five creatures of your choice within 60 feet of you a +10 bonus to initiative.

psionic.name: Psionic Restoration
entries: You wield psionic energy to curar ferides and restore health to yourself and others.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, pots, com a acció bonus, touch a creature that has 0 hit points and stabilize it.

modes.name: Mend Wounds
entries: Com a acció, you can spend psi points to restore hit points to one creature you touch. The creature regains {@scaledice 1d8|1-7|1d8|psi} hit points per psi point spent.

modes.name: Restore Health
entries: Com a acció, you touch one creature and remove one of the following conditions from it: {@condition encegat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition paralitzat}, o {@condition emmetzinat}. Alternatively, you remove one disease from the creature.

modes.name: Restore Life
entries: Com a acció, you touch one creature that has died within the last minute. The creature returns to life with 1 hit point. This ability can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore a creature missing any vital body parts.

modes.name: Restore Vigor
entries: Com a acció, you can touch one creature and choose un/a dels següents: remove any reductions to one of its ability scores, remove one effect that reduces its punts de vida màxims, or reduce its {@condition exhaust} level by one.

psionic.name: Psionic Weapon
entries: You have learned how to channel psionic energy into your attacks, lending them devastating power.
psionic.focus: Whenever you focus on this discipline, choose one weapon you're holding or your atac desarmat. When you attack with it while focused on this discipline, its damage is psychic and magical, rather than its normal damage type. Until you reach 6th level as a mystic, you don't add your Força or Destresa modifier to the psychic attack's damage rolls.

modes.name: Ethereal Weapon
entries: Com a acció bonus, you temporarily transform one weapon you're holding or your atac desarmat into pure psionic energy. The next attack you make with it before the end of your turn ignores the target's armor, requiring no attack roll. Instead, the target makes a Destresa saving throw against this discipline. Si falla, rep the attack's normal damage and suffers its additional effects. Si supera, the target takes half damage from the attack but suffers no additional effects that would normally be imposed on a hit.

modes.name: Lethal Strike
entries: Com a acció bonus, you imbue a weapon you're holding or your atac desarmat with psychic energy. The next time you hit with it before the end of your turn, it deals an extra {@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi} de dany psíquic per psi point spent.

modes.name: Augmented Weapon
entries: Com a acció bonus, touch one simple or martial weapon. Until your concentration ends, that weapon becomes a magic weapon with a +3 bonus to its attack and damage rolls.

psionic.name: Setge Psíquic
entries: You wield your mind like a weapon, unleashing salvos of psionic energy.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, Tens un +2 a damage rolls with psionic talents that deal psychic damage.

modes.name: Psionic Blast
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. The target takes {@scaledamage 1d8|1-7|1d8|psi} de dany psíquic per psi point spent on this ability.

modes.name: Fuet d'Ego
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, rep {@damage 3d8} de dany psíquic, and it is filled with self-doubt, leaving it able to use its action on its next turn only to take the Dodge, Disengage, or Hide action. On a successful saving throw, it takes half as much damage.

modes.name: Insinuació d'Id
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, rep {@damage 5d8} de dany psíquic, and it goes into a fury, as its id runs rampant. On its next turn, it can use its action only to take the Dodge or Attack action. Si supera en rep la meitat.

modes.name: Psychic Blast
entries: Com a acció, you unleash devastating psychic energy en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, rep {@damage 8d8} de dany psíquic; si supera, en rep la meitat. You can increase the damage by {@scaledamage 8d8|6-7|2d8|psi} if you spend 1 more psi point on this ability.

modes.name: Psychic Crush
entries: Com a acció, you create a 20-foot cube of psychic energy within 120 feet of you. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, a target rep {@damage 8d8} de dany psíquic i està {@condition atordit} fins el final del teu proper torn. Si supera en rep la meitat.

psionic.name: Psychic Disruption
entries: You create psychic static that disrupts other creatures' ability to think clearly.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens avantatge a tirades de Carisma ({@skill Engany}) checks.

modes.name: Distracting Haze
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. That creature ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, rep {@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi} de dany psíquic per psi point spent and can't see anything more than 10 feet from it until your concentration ends. Si supera en rep la meitat.

modes.name: Daze
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. That creature ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, the target is {@condition incapacitat} fins el final del teu proper torn or until it takes any damage.

modes.name: Mind Storm
entries: Com a acció, choose a point que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Tota criatura en una esfera de 20 peus de radi centrada en aquell punt ha de salvar per Saviesa. Si falla, a target rep {@damage 6d8} de dany psíquic and suffers disadvantage on all saving throws fins el final del teu proper torn. Qui superi en rep la meitat. You can increase the damage by {@scaledamage 6d8|5-7|1d6|psi} per additional psi point spent on this ability.

psionic.name: Psychic Hammer
entries: Com a acció, you try to grasp una criatura que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast, with a hand crafted from telekinetic energy. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Força. Si falla, rep {@damage 1d6} de dany de força. If it takes any of this damage and is Large or smaller, you can move it fins a 10 peus in a straight line in a direction of your choice. You can't lift the target off the ground unless it is already airborne or underwater.
The talent's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).

psionic.name: Psychic Inquisition
entries: You reach into a creature's mind to uncover information or plant ideas within it.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you know when a creature communicating with you via telepathy is lying.

modes.name: Hammer of Inquisition
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, rep {@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi} de dany psíquic per psi point spent and suffers disadvantage on its next Saviesa saving throw before the end of your next turn. Si supera en rep la meitat.

modes.name: Forceful Query
entries: Com a acció, you ask a question of one creature that can see and hear you within 30 feet of you. The question must be phrased so that it can be answered with a yes or no, otherwise this ability fails. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa, or it replies with a truthful answer. A creature is immune to this ability if it is immune to being {@condition fascinat}.

modes.name: Ransack Mind
entries: While you concentrate on this ability, you probe one creature's mind. The creature must remain within 30 feet of you, and you must be able to see it. If you reach the ability's full duration, the target must make three Intel·ligència saving throws, and you learn information from it based on the number of saving throws it fails. With one failed saving throw, you learn its key memories from the past 12 hours. With two failed saving throws, you learn its key memories from the past 24 hours. With three failed saving throws, you learn its key memories from the past 48 hours.

modes.name: Phantom Idea
entries: While you concentrate on this ability, you probe one creature's mind. The creature must remain within 30 feet of you, and you must be able to see it. If you reach the ability's full duration, the target must make three Intel·ligència saving throws, and you plant a memory or an idea in it, which lasts for a number of hours based on the number of saving throws it fails. You choose whether the idea or memory is trivial (such as "I had porridge for breakfast" or "Ale is the worst") or personality-defining ("I failed to save my village from orc marauders and am therefore a coward" or "Magic is a scourge, so I renounce it"). With one failed saving throw, the idea or memory lasts durant les properes 4 hores. With two failed saving throws, it lasts for 24 hours. With three failed saving throws, it lasts for 48 hours.

psionic.name: Psychic Phantoms
entries: Your power reaches into a creature's mind and causes it false perceptions
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, tens avantatge a tirades de Carisma ({@skill Engany}) checks.

modes.name: Distracting Figment
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, rep {@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi} de dany psíquic per psi point spent and thinks it perceives a threatening creature just out of its sight; fins el final del teu proper torn, it can't use reactions, and melee attack rolls against it have advantage. Si supera en rep la meitat.

modes.name: Phantom Foe
entries: Com a acció, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, it perceives a horrid creature adjacent to it until your concentration ends. During this time, the target can't take reactions, and it rep {@damage 1d8} de dany psíquic a l'inici de cada torn seu. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. You can increase the damage by {@scaledamage 1d8|3-7|1d8|psi} for each additional psi point spent on the ability

modes.name: Phantom Betrayal
entries: Com a acció, you plant delusional paranoia in a creature's mind. Escull una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. or until your concentration ends, it must target its allies with attacks and other damaging effects. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. A creature is immune to this ability if it is immune to being {@condition fascinat}.

modes.name: Phantom Riches
entries: Com a acció, you plant the phantom of a greatly desired object in a creature's mind. Escull una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, you gain partial control over the target's behavior until your concentration ends; the target moves as you wish on each of its turns, as it thinks it pursues the phantom object it desires. If it hasn't taken damage since its last turn, it can use its action only to admire the object you created in its perception. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

psionic.name: Telepathic Contact
entries: By channeling psionic power, you gain the ability to control other creatures by substituting your will for their own.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you gain the ability to use your Telepathy class feature with up to six creatures at once. If you don't have that feature from the mystic class, you instead gain it while focused on this discipline.

modes.name: Exacting Query
entries: Com a acció, you target one creature you can communicate with via telepathy. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, the target truthfully answers one question you ask it via telepathy. Si supera, the target is unaffected, and you can't use this ability on it again until you finish a long rest. A creature is immune to this ability if it is immune to being {@condition fascinat}.

modes.name: Occluded Mind
entries: Com a acció, you target one creature you can communicate with via telepathy. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, the target believes one statement of your choice for the next 5 minutes that you communicate to it via telepathy. The statement can be up to ten words long, and it must describe you or a creature or an object the target can see. Si supera, the target is unaffected, and you can't use this ability on it again until you finish a long rest. A creature is immune to this ability if it is immune to being {@condition fascinat}.

modes.name: Broken Will
entries: Com a acció, you target one creature you can communicate with via telepathy. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. Si falla, you choose the target's movement and action on its next turn. Si supera, the target is unaffected, and you can't use this ability on it again until you finish a long rest. A creature is immune to this ability if it is immune to being {@condition fascinat}.

modes.name: Psychic Grip
entries: Com a acció, you target una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. or it is {@condition paralitzat} until your concentration ends. Al final de cada torn seu, it can repeat the saving throw. On a success, this effect ends. On a failure, you can use your reaction to force the target to move up to half its speed, even though it's {@condition paralitzat}.

modes.name: Psychic Domination
entries: Com a acció, you target una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència. or you choose the creature's actions and movement on its turns until your concentration ends. Al final de cada torn seu, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature is immune to this ability if it is immune to being {@condition fascinat}.

psionic.name: Third Eye
entries: You create a third, psychic eye in your mind, which you cast out into the world. It channels thoughts and knowledge back to you, greatly enhancing your senses.
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have darkvision amb un abast de 60 peus. If you already have darkvision with that range or greater, increase its range by 10 feet.

modes.name: Tremorsense
entries: Com a acció bonus, you gain tremorsense with a radius of 30 feet, which lasts until your concentration ends.

modes.name: Unwavering Eye
entries: Com a acció bonus, you gain advantage on Saviesa checks durant 1 minut.

modes.name: Piercing Sight
entries: Com a acció bonus, you gain the ability to see through objects that are up to 1 foot thick within 30 feet of you. This sight lasts until your concentration ends.

modes.name: Truesight
entries: Com a acció bonus, you gain truesight with a radius of 30 feet, which lasts until your concentration ends.
